## auth.UpdateRequest interface

Interface representing the properties to update on the provided user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface UpdateRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disabled](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.disabled.md) | boolean | Whether or not the user is disabled: <code>true</code> for disabled; <code>false</code> for enabled. |
|  [displayName](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.displayname.md) | string \| null | The user's display name. |
|  [email](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.email.md) | string | The user's primary email. |
|  [emailVerified](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.emailverified.md) | boolean | Whether or not the user's primary email is verified. |
|  [multiFactor](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.multifactor.md) | [MultiFactorUpdateSettings](./firebase-admin.auth.multifactorupdatesettings.md) | The user's updated multi-factor related properties. |
|  [password](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.password.md) | string | The user's unhashed password. |
|  [phoneNumber](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.phonenumber.md) | string \| null | The user's primary phone number. |
|  [photoURL](./firebase-admin.auth.updaterequest.photourl.md) | string \| null | The user's photo URL. |
